title: Behavior of code that multiplies inside a loop

content.question:
Consider the following code segment.

Which of the following best describes the behavior of the code segment?

choices.label: The code segment displays the value of <math alttext="2 times, open parenthesis, 5 times 3, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> by initializing result to 2 and then multiplying result by 3 a total of five times.

The code segment displays the value of <math alttext="2 times, open parenthesis, 5 times 3, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> by initializing result to 2 and then multiplying result by 5 a total of three times.

The code segment displays the value of <math alttext="2 times, open parenthesis, 5 cubed, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><msup><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> by initializing result to 2 and then multiplying result by 3 a total of five times.

The code segment displays the value of <math alttext="2 times, open parenthesis, 5 cubed, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><msup><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> by initializing result to 2 and then multiplying result by 5 a total of three times.

content.answer: The code segment displays the value of <math alttext="2 times, open parenthesis, 5 cubed, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><msup><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> by initializing result to 2 and then multiplying result by 5 a total of three times.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Explain how a code segment or program functions.
